title: Harmonic Disruption: Live Experimental Set
description:
An immersive evening featuring renowned sound artists exploring the boundaries between noise and healing frequencies. Experience custom-built instruments and interactive sound installations.

This special performance brings together three pioneering sound artists who each approach sonic exploration from unique perspectives. The evening will feature original compositions created specifically for this intimate space, with aspects of audience participation and immersive listening experiences.

Attendees will have the opportunity to experience sound in new dimensions as artists manipulate frequencies that are felt as much as heard. The event concludes with a guided group sound meditation that incorporates elements from the performances.
shortDescription: An immersive evening featuring renowned sound artists exploring the boundaries between noise and healing frequencies. Experience custom-built instruments and interactive sound installations.

title: Sonic Meditation: Group Healing
description:
Experience deep relaxation and healing through therapeutic sound frequencies, crystal bowls, and guided meditation. This session combines ancient and modern techniques to create a transformative sound journey.

Led by certified sound healing practitioners, this session utilizes crystal singing bowls, gongs, and carefully calibrated electronic frequencies to induce deep states of relaxation. Participants will be guided through a meditation designed to open receptivity to the healing potential of sound vibrations.

This event is suitable for both beginners and those experienced with sound healing. Comfortable clothing is recommended, and yoga mats and blankets will be provided for your comfort during the session.
shortDescription: Experience deep relaxation and healing through therapeutic sound frequencies, crystal bowls, and guided meditation.

title: DIY Sound Instruments Workshop
description:
Learn to build your own experimental sound instruments using recycled materials and basic electronics. All materials provided. This hands-on workshop will guide you through the process of creating unique sound-making objects.

Participants will learn basic principles of acoustic sound generation and simple electronic circuits to create their own experimental instruments. From contact microphones to string resonators, you'll explore multiple approaches to sound creation using everyday materials.

No prior experience with electronics or instrument building is necessary. This workshop is suitable for adults and teens (14+). All tools and materials will be provided, and participants will take home their completed instruments.
shortDescription: Learn to build your own experimental sound instruments using recycled materials and basic electronics. All materials provided.

title: Resonant Frequencies: AV Experience
description:
An immersive audio-visual journey through frequencies that resonant with human emotions and physiology. Featuring projection mapping and synchronized sound design.

This event merges cutting-edge visual projection technologies with carefully composed sonic environments to create a multisensory experience. The performance explores the concept of resonance across different scales—from the cellular to the cosmic—and invites audiences to experience how specific frequencies can evoke emotional and physiological responses.

The immersive installation transforms the entire space into a living canvas of light and sound, with performance segments interspersed throughout the evening. Attendees are welcome to move freely through the space and experience the work from different perspectives.
shortDescription: An immersive audio-visual journey through frequencies that resonant with human emotions and physiology. Featuring projection mapping.

title: Sound Bath: Deep Listening Experience
description:
Immerse yourself in a deeply restorative sound bath featuring Himalayan singing bowls, gongs, and ambient electronics. This meditative experience is designed to release tension and promote healing.

Participants will be guided into a receptive state of relaxation before being immersed in waves of harmonic sounds. The carefully orchestrated progression of tones and textures works to entrain brainwaves and facilitate a state of deep calm.

This sound bath combines traditional instruments with subtle electronic elements to create a contemporary healing environment. No meditation experience is necessary—simply arrive with an openness to the experience.
shortDescription: Immerse yourself in a deeply restorative sound bath featuring Himalayan singing bowls, gongs, and ambient electronics.

title: Noise Therapy: Electronic Sound Performance
description:
A boundary-pushing performance exploring the therapeutic potential of noise music and distorted frequencies. Three electronic artists present works that challenge and transform.

This event investigates the less-explored territory where experimental noise intersects with therapeutic practice. Featuring three sets from pioneering electronic artists, the performances will range from structured compositions to improvisational explorations.

Between sets, a sound therapist will guide brief reflective sessions to help audiences process and integrate their listening experience. The evening concludes with a discussion between the artists and attendees about the potential healing dimensions of challenging sonic environments.
shortDescription: A boundary-pushing performance exploring the therapeutic potential of noise music and distorted frequencies.

title: Vibrational Healing Workshop
description:
Learn practical techniques for using sound and vibration in personal healing practices. This workshop combines theory with hands-on exercises and take-home tools.

Participants will gain an understanding of how different frequencies affect the body and mind, based on both traditional wisdom and contemporary research. The workshop includes instruction in vocal toning, the use of simple instruments, and the principles of creating healing sonic environments.

Each participant will receive a tuning fork and instruction manual to continue their practice at home. No prior experience is necessary, and the techniques taught can be integrated into existing meditation or wellness routines.
shortDescription: Learn practical techniques for using sound and vibration in personal healing practices. Includes take-home tools.

title: Ambient Soundscapes: Live Composition
description:
An evening of lush, evolving ambient music performed live and specifically composed for deep listening and relaxation. Features processed acoustic instruments and electronics.

This performance brings together three ambient music artists who specialize in creating immersive sonic environments. Each set explores different approaches to ambient composition—from processed acoustic instruments to modular synthesis and field recordings.

The performance space will be arranged with comfortable seating and lying areas to encourage deep listening. The evening is designed as a journey through different emotional landscapes, with each artist building upon the atmosphere created by the previous performance.
shortDescription: An evening of lush, evolving ambient music performed live and specifically composed for deep listening and relaxation.
